<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> High Command

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Removes group from unit's [[High Command|high command]] bar.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''hcRemoveGroup''' group

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]] -

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> group: [[Group]] -

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> Nothing

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[hcRemoveGroup]] BIS_group;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[High Command]], [[hcAllGroups]], [[hcGroupParams]], [[hcLeader]], [[hcRemoveAllGroups]], [[hcSelected]], [[hcSelectGroup]], [[hcSetGroup]], [[hcShowBar]], [[hcShownBar]], [[onHCGroupSelectionChanged]]
</value></part></template>
